about_the_game: This game plunges you into a mysterious and challenging arms warehouse. The game's visuals adopt a dark tone, creating a tense and mysterious atmosphere. Players take on the role of an explorer, using the ASDW keys to navigate through the warehouse and the space bar to jump, aiding the character in overcoming various obstacles. Inside this cluttered warehouse, you will discover a plethora of military supplies, including weapons, ammunition, and various equipment. However, the path of exploration is far from smooth; the warehouse is filled with obstacles and traps, requiring players to skillfully use jumping and dodging techniques to proceed cautiously. The game is equipped with rich sound effects, from the sound of footsteps to the pleasant chimes when discovering supplies and the warning sounds when encountering danger, greatly enhancing the immersive experience. This is a game that tests players' operational skills while offering plenty of adventure.

name: Conundrum

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: intel Core i7-9700
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: intel Core i7-9700
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 2060
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
